_header: O Jesu grant me Thy will of weeping
Subjects: fifteen, O’s of Christ; Christ, fifteen O’s; envoys
_description: The Fifteen O’s — fifteen 8-line stanzas and a 6-line Envoy

PierpontM486.First Lines: O Jhesu grant me þi will of wepynge…
